## Coming Spring 2026
This course is currently under development.

This course explores how consumers, managers, and organizations navigate ethical decisions in commercial contexts. We examine frameworks for moral reasoning and apply them to contemporary business challenges.

## Course Format

Asynchronous online. All materials will be designed to be accessible and self-paced.

## Topics

Planned topics include:

- Foundations of moral psychology
- Consumer responses to corporate ethics and CSR
- Pricing and fairness
- Privacy and data ethics
- Environmental and sustainability ethics
- Whistleblowing and organizational moral courage
